ratman_guard.title: ratman_guard
ratman_guard.name: Rat-man
ratman_guard.description: A humanoid rodent that lives in swarming colonies
ratman_guard.rumor: The rocks are smeared with dung. A terrible stench

blinkbeast.title: blinkbeast
blinkbeast.name: Blinkbeast
blinkbeast.description: An ethereal hunter from the astral plane
blinkbeast.rumor: There is an unusual silence. A strange light flickers in the distance
blinkbeast.taunt: The [color=#8050af]Blinkbeast[/color] drags your body through a gap in the air...

hobgoblin.title: hobgoblin
hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
hobgoblin.rumor: You hear the rattle of crude armor

hound_alpha.title: hound_alpha
hound_alpha.name: Hound Alpha
hound_alpha.description: A yelping beast of imposing stature
hound_alpha.rumor: You hear the yipping of wild dogs
hound_alpha.taunt: The [color=#f0a060]Hound Alpha[/color] latches onto your throat. Your knees buckle...

slagh_skirmisher.title: slagh_skirmisher
slagh_skirmisher.name: Slagh Skirmisher
slagh_skirmisher.rumor: You see a moss altar decorated with bleached skulls
slagh_skirmisher.taunt: The [color=#30af40]Slagh Skirmisher[/color] dances over your exhausted body...

mud_golem.title: mud_golem
mud_golem.name: Mud Wretch
mud_golem.description: A hulk of mud animated by an enchanted scroll
mud_golem.rumor: There are wide footprints in the dust

heretic.title: heretic
heretic.name: Zindiq
heretic.rumor: You see the remains of a defiled shrine

irga_guard.title: irga_guard
irga_guard.name: Irga Guard
irga_guard.description: A fanatic soldier from the tunnels above the infernal plane
irga_guard.rumor: There is a rumor of marauders adorned in gold
irga_guard.taunt: The [color=#ff0070]Irga Guard[/color] drags you to its master...

greenwyrm.title: greenwyrm
greenwyrm.name: Green Wyrm
greenwyrm.description: A green-scaled beast guarding its lair. Will crouch motionless and spew fire
greenwyrm.rumor: In the distance you hear a shrieking roar
greenwyrm.taunt: The [color=#40ff00]Green Wyrm[/color] blankets you in flames...

bramblemonk.title: bramblemonk
bramblemonk.name: Bramble Priest
bramblemonk.description: A green-robed acolyte of the unruly vine
bramblemonk.rumor: There is a crumbling vine-wrapped altar
bramblemonk.taunt: The [color=#70af00]Bramble Priest[/color] sprouts a vine in your chest...

witheredimp.title: witheredimp
witheredimp.name: Withered Imp
witheredimp.description: An exiled demon wretch. Now spreads blight in the service of a Deathdrake
witheredimp.rumor: You see an altar lit with sickly green flames
witheredimp.taunt: The [color=#a0a000]Withered Imp[/color] taps you with its foul scepter...

icebeetle.title: icebeetle
icebeetle.name: Ice Beetle
icebeetle.description: An enormous skittering beast from the distant ice caves
icebeetle.rumor: You see a decaying blue exoskeleton
icebeetle.taunt: The [color=#5070ff]Ice Beetle[/color] douses you in a wave of frost...

firedrake.title: firedrake
firedrake.name: Firedrake
firedrake.description: A slithering beast of the vast underground lava flats
firedrake.rumor: You smell smoke. The ground trembles
firedrake.taunt: The [color=#ff7000]Firedrake[/color] roars triumphantly. Your body is covered in flames...

deathdrake.title: deathdrake
deathdrake.name: Deathdrake
deathdrake.description: A once-noble drake cursed to live as an enraged avatar of decay
deathdrake.rumor: Travellers speak of the "wings of death"
deathdrake.intro:
The [color=#a0a000]Deathdrake[/color] hisses viciously!

The stench...foul redolence...
deathdrake.taunt: The [color=#a0a000]Deathdrake[/color] roars sickeningly. Your body shrivels...

slagh_astromancer.title: slagh_astromancer
slagh_astromancer.name: Slagh Astromancer
slagh_astromancer.description: A revered star-dancer of the deep forests
slagh_astromancer.rumor: There is a great mound of skulls covered in moss and shimmering purple flowers
slagh_astromancer.intro:
The [color=#30af40]Slagh Astromancer[/color] gestures at you...

"O pilgrim...beast of hungry stars...my trophy..."
slagh_astromancer.taunt: The [color=#30af40]Slagh Astromancer[/color] dances around your stunned body. A violet rift appears...

burrowking.title: burrowking
burrowking.name: Burrow King
burrowking.rumor: You see a horrific statue made of dung. It is in the shape of a crown
burrowking.intro:
The [color=#c0c040]Burrow King[/color] rises from his pile of dung...

"Squeak squeak"...such horrific nobility...
burrowking.taunt: The [color=#c0c040]Burrow King[/color] squeaks commandingly. Your body is impaled...

boga.title: boga
boga.name: Boga
boga.description: A writhing clay-colored serpent from the underworld
boga.rumor: The ground is littered with discarded scales
boga.taunt: The [color=#af4040]Boga[/color] wraps you in its coils...

ratman_phalangite.title: ratman_phalangite
ratman_phalangite.name: Rat-man Phalangite
ratman_phalangite.description: A disciplined guardian of the rat-man colonies
ratman_phalangite.rumor: The rat-men have raised their flag here

slagh_rider.title: slagh_rider
slagh_rider.name: Slagh Rider
slagh_rider.description: A swift hunter of the Slagh clans
slagh_rider.rumor: You see a skull etched with the carving of a dog
slagh_rider.taunt: The [color=#30af40]Slagh Rider[/color] severs your throat with a hooked knife...

wechuge.title: wechuge
wechuge.name: Wechuge
wechuge.description: A spirit-beast made from ice and spells
wechuge.rumor: You see mounds of unnatural blue ice

Fera.title: Fera
Fera.name: Ferod
Fera.description: An elemental mass of malicious vines. Serves the disembodied will of a destroyed forest
Fera.rumor: It is said evil vines grow here
Fera.taunt: The [color=#70af00]Ferod[/color] strangles you with its writhing vines...

bugbear.title: bugbear
bugbear.name: Bugbear
bugbear.rumor: There is a rumor of children vanishing

sporebeast.title: sporebeast
sporebeast.name: Sporebeast
sporebeast.description: A strange creature that waddles beneath a poisonous shell
sporebeast.rumor: There are huge nests of acrid-smelling moss

torch_priest.title: torch_priest
torch_priest.name: Torch Priest
torch_priest.rumor: You see a path lined with burnt bodies and scraps of red cloth
torch_priest.taunt: The [color=#ff7000]Torch Priest[/color] sings "O flame! O beauteous flame!"...

irga_priest.title: irga_priest
irga_priest.name: Irga Priest
irga_priest.description: An ecstatic cultist from the tunnels above the infernal plane
irga_priest.rumor: There is a rumor of marauders adorned in gold
irga_priest.taunt: The [color=#ff0070]Irga Priest[/color] stamps its crimson feet in a wild dance...

golganth.title: golganth
golganth.name: Golganth
golganth.description: A winged beast that feeds on corpses
golganth.rumor: A dark beast hunts here. The land is emptied of life

chimerabeetle.title: chimerabeetle
chimerabeetle.name: Chimera Beetle
chimerabeetle.description: An enormous beetle brimming with unstable magic
chimerabeetle.rumor: You find the remains of a strange iridescent shell
chimerabeetle.taunt: The [color=#ff00ff]Chimera Beetle[/color] tramples your charred body...

bluewyrmrider.title: bluewyrmrider
bluewyrmrider.name: Storm Knight
bluewyrmrider.description: An exiled knight bonded to a wingless Blue Wyrm
bluewyrmrider.rumor: You perceive brief glints of blue metal
bluewyrmrider.taunt: The [color=#3060ff]Storm Knight[/color] smites you "Thy glory ends"...

heliot.title: heliot
heliot.name: Heliot
heliot.description: A pale dancing warrior with an enchanted acid-blade.
heliot.rumor: It is said pale warriors lurk here

thunderdrake.title: thunderdrake
thunderdrake.name: Thunderdrake
thunderdrake.description: A haughty beast of mountain storms
thunderdrake.rumor: You hear the echo of an unnatural storm
thunderdrake.intro:
The [color=#0060ff]Thunderdrake[/color] roars!

Sparks dance through the air...
thunderdrake.taunt: The [color=#0060ff]Thunderdrake[/color] roars piercingly. Your body is filled with lightning...

venomdrake.title: venomdrake
venomdrake.name: Fumedrake
venomdrake.description: A deadly beast of poison mists
venomdrake.rumor: You hear the hiss of obscene vapors
venomdrake.intro:
The [color=#50ff00]Fumedrake[/color] roars!

A deadly stench billows...
venomdrake.taunt: The [color=#50ff00]Fumedrake[/color] hisses with delight. Your body succumbs to roiling sickness...

umbrarch.title: umbrarch
umbrarch.name: Umbrarch
umbrarch.description: An arrogant demon-warrior cast out of the dark between the stars. Marked by the horns of hubris
umbrarch.rumor: You observe a congregation of delirious worshippers. They claim to follow the "shadow god"
umbrarch.intro:
The [color=#8030af]Umbrarch[/color] raises a shimmering blade...

"Little pilgrim...you have climbed so high..."

irga_knight.title: irga_knight
irga_knight.name: Irga Knight
irga_knight.description: A champion of the Irga tunnels. Protected by imbued gold
irga_knight.rumor: Terrified travellers speak of the "golden king"
irga_knight.intro:
The [color=#ff0070]Irga Knight[/color] blocks your path...

"O lord of dismemberment...witness my axe..."
irga_knight.taunt: The [color=#ff0070]Irga Knight[/color] cuts you in half..."Lord...honor me..."

ikuma.title: ikuma
ikuma.name: Ikuma
ikuma.description: A debauched mage-giant exiled by the Surtmir clans
ikuma.rumor: Strange red and blue fires shift through the air
ikuma.intro:
The [color=#5070ff]Ikuma[/color] beats its chest!

"O stench of fire! O ripple of ice!"
ikuma.taunt: The [color=#5070ff]Ikuma[/color] bellows a chant over your frozen body...

ruk.title: ruk
ruk.name: Ruk
ruk.description: A gigantic eagle from a distant mountain-island
ruk.taunt: The [color=#906010]Ruk[/color] crushes you in its talons...

caveworm.title: caveworm
caveworm.name: Cave Worm
caveworm.description: A titanic worm that carves tunnels beneath the world
caveworm.rumor: You see deep chasms of broken earth
caveworm.intro: The [color=#704030]Cave Worm[/color] emerges from the depths!
caveworm.taunt: The [color=#704030]Cave Worm[/color] pulverizes you with its heavy coils...

fey_partisan.title: fey_partisan
fey_partisan.name: Fey Partisan
fey_partisan.description: A stealthy warlord of the forbidden trods. Despises all mortals
fey_partisan.rumor: A thin moss-green banner ripples in the wind
fey_partisan.intro:
The [color=#20af60]Fey Partisan[/color] ambushes you!

"What abhorrent noise..."
fey_partisan.taunt: The [color=#20af60]Fey Partisan[/color] jabs you with a sickening lance...

RukThrall.title: RukThrall
RukThrall.name: Ruk-Thrall
RukThrall.description: A fanatic servant of a mighty Ruk
RukThrall.rumor: You discern the glint of lances
RukThrall.taunt: The [color=#906010]Ruk-Thrall[/color] catches you with its lance...

Brungle.title: Brungle
Brungle.name: Brungle
Brungle.description: A tunnel-dweller of incredible strength. Worships a nameless burrowing beast

skin_priest.title: skin_priest
skin_priest.name: Skin Priest
skin_priest.description: A solitary apostate of Eresh. Intoxicated by the power of reanimation
skin_priest.rumor: You see the remains of a crude altar. You smell putrefying flesh
skin_priest.taunt: The [color=#a0a000]Skin Priest[/color] sings "O death! O nimble-footed death!"...

writhing_monk.title: writhing_monk
writhing_monk.name: Writhing Monk
writhing_monk.description: A deranged mystic whose body was long ago merged with creatures of the astral dark
writhing_monk.rumor: You see wreaths of coiling chitin

thunder_priest.title: thunder_priest
thunder_priest.name: Thunder Priest
thunder_priest.description: An apostate of Hadad. Worships the preserved blood of a Storm Drake
thunder_priest.rumor: You see a glittering blue altar. The wind howls
thunder_priest.taunt: The [color=#0060ff]Thunder Priest[/color] sings "O storm! O gorgeous ruination!"...

fey_scout.title: fey_scout
fey_scout.name: Fey Scout
fey_scout.description: A secretive fey of the forbidden trods
fey_scout.rumor: You hear a faint chorus of high-pitched laughter
fey_scout.taunt: The [color=#20af60]Fey[/color] giggles. Your body is numb...

umbralith.title: umbralith
umbralith.name: Umbralith
umbralith.description: A phantamsal horror of the astral plane. Birthed from the corpse of an Umbrarch
umbralith.rumor: The air distorts in shimmering curls
umbralith.taunt: The [color=#8030af]Umbralith[/color] wraps you in its formless limbs...

rhombid.title: rhombid
rhombid.name: Rhombid
rhombid.description: A levitating construct summoned from the mind-dimension
rhombid.rumor: An otherworldly humming fills the air
rhombid.taunt: The [color=#ffaf30]Rhombid[/color] hums deafeningly. Your mind vanishes...

acidbeast.title: acidbeast
acidbeast.name: Acid Beast
acidbeast.description: A frenzied mass of elemental acid
acidbeast.rumor: You see the dissolved remnants of armor

longlegs.title: longlegs
longlegs.name: Longlegs
longlegs.description: A giant spider hatched from an ancient nest
longlegs.rumor: You smell an alarming insectoid musk
longlegs.taunt: The [color=#90a050]Longlegs[/color] leans over you. It chitters excitedly...

surtmir.title: surtmir
surtmir.name: Surtmir
surtmir.description: A brutal warrior summoned from a frozen volcano
surtmir.rumor: You see spirals of burning ice

starbrute.title: starbrute
starbrute.name: Star-Brute
starbrute.description: A fearless warrior summoned from a midnight storm
starbrute.rumor: Weird bolts of violet lightning pulse overhead

shesha.title: shesha
shesha.name: Shesha
shesha.description: A sacred reptilian from the underground sea
shesha.rumor: You see an altar with paintings of black waves and violet stars
shesha.taunt: The [color=#a05090]Shesha[/color] beats its shield. It lets out a reptilian shriek...

bloodrevenant.title: bloodrevenant
bloodrevenant.name: Blood Revenant
bloodrevenant.description: A vengeful warrior-spirit animated by bloodlust
bloodrevenant.rumor: You see the remnants of shattered weapons. You smell blood
bloodrevenant.taunt: The [color=#af3030]Blood Revenant[/color] rips open your skin...

taurid.title: taurid
taurid.name: Taurid
taurid.description: A beast that crushes distant enemies with its divine stomp
taurid.rumor: You hear the rumbling of hooves
taurid.taunt: The [color=#ffa050]Taurid[/color] crushes you beneath its hooves...

ogre.title: ogre
ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.description: A cannibal giant sometimes known as "the hungry god"
ogre.rumor: It is said the "hungry god" lives here
ogre.intro:
The [color=#af7020]Ogre[/color] raises its blood-drenched club!

There is an incredible stench of gore...
ogre.taunt: The [color=#af7020]Ogre[/color] lifts you into its drooling maw...

drakon.title: drakon
drakon.name: Hierophant
drakon.description: A dragon wizard-king with a shimmering golden staff
drakon.rumor: You see a draconic statue decorated with golden orbs
drakon.intro:
The [color=#009000]Hierophant[/color] grimaces...

"Little pilgrim...In the hour of flood..."

metalith.title: metalith
metalith.name: Metalith
metalith.description: A congealed mass of Umbraliths attempting to colonize the material plane
metalith.rumor: The sky is flooded with bizarre shimmering light

basilisk.title: basilisk
basilisk.name: Basilisk
basilisk.description: An ill-born serpent with the head of a rooster. Inflicts a blighting curse on all who approach
basilisk.rumor: The ground is marred by coiling trails of blight

tupilaq.title: tupilaq
tupilaq.name: Tupilaq
tupilaq.description: A murderous antlered spirit from the glacial expanse
tupilaq.rumor: The tower is encrusted with unnatural whorls of ice
tupilaq.intro:
The [color=#109090]Tupilaq[/color] moans!

Sharp smell of ice...
tupilaq.taunt: The [color=#109090]Tupilaq[/color] crushes you with enchanted ice...

keliot.title: keliot
keliot.name: Keliot
keliot.description: A reptilian hunter-prince from an ancient marsh of perpetual dawn
keliot.rumor: A dank wind brushes you. There is a sharp reptilian stink
keliot.intro:
The [color=#609010]Keliot[/color] emerges from the shadows!

"O hunted one..."

tethic_knight.title: tethic_knight
tethic_knight.name: Tethic Knight
tethic_knight.description: A lord of the Tethic order. Armed with a ritualistic fanged blade
tethic_knight.rumor: It is said this place is haunted by a "Lord of Mouths"
tethic_knight.intro:
The [color=#5040a0]Tethic Knight[/color] gestures at you!

"O friendly teeth...beloved consumption..."

agarithum.title: agarithum
agarithum.name: Agarithum
agarithum.description: A time-devouring beast and fungal master. Absorbs the wasted future of fallen allies
agarithum.rumor: Immense strands of blurred fungus entwine the tower's surface
agarithum.taunt: The [color=#904060]Agarithum[/color] covers you in quivering pink spores...

AgnitarIdol.title: AgnitarIdol
AgnitarIdol.name: Agni Idol
AgnitarIdol.description: A shrine of solid bronze that harbors an astral flame. A conduit of the ancient destroyer-god Agni
AgnitarIdol.rumor: Travellers claim the "will of Agni" once ruled here
AgnitarIdol.taunt: The [color=#ff9040]Agni Idol[/color] commends you to its violet flame

orchidwretch.title: orchidwretch
orchidwretch.name: Orchid Wretch
orchidwretch.rumor: Your nose wrinkles at the heady scent of decaying flowers
orchidwretch.taunt: The [color=#af30df]Orchid Wretch[/color] sings "O pleasure! O undefeatable consumption!"

yellowpriest.title: yellowpriest
yellowpriest.name: Yellow Priest
yellowpriest.rumor: You see a mass grave of headless pilgrims dressed in yellow robes
yellowpriest.taunt: The [color=#dfdf30]Yellow Priest[/color] sings "O succulence! O fruit of the dying mind!"

icepriest.title: icepriest
icepriest.name: Ice Priest
icepriest.rumor: You see antlered effigies covered in blue rags
icepriest.taunt: The [color=#109090]Ice Priest[/color] chants "O ice! O Shining annihilation!"

acroserpent.title: acroserpent
acroserpent.name: Acroserpent
acroserpent.description: A massive serpent from a primeval marsh
acroserpent.rumor: The path is lined with strangled half-digested corpses
acroserpent.taunt: The [color=#609010]Acroserpent[/color] binds you in its coils...

agarite.title: agarite
agarite.name: Agarite
agarite.description: A cultist infected by a strange fungus that absorbs time
agarite.rumor: You see trails of quivering fungus
agarite.taunt: The [color=#904060]Agarite[/color] guts you with a transparent sickle...

gibbousmouth.title: gibbousmouth
gibbousmouth.name: Gibbous Mouth
gibbousmouth.description: A twitching horror spawned for war by a Tethic mage
gibbousmouth.rumor: There are whole skeletons cleaned of flesh

firewasp.title: firewasp
firewasp.name: Fire Wasp
firewasp.description: An stinging insect distorted by a forbidden desert ritual
firewasp.rumor: You hear a ferocious insectoid buzzing. You smell smoke
firewasp.taunt: The [color=#ff7000]Fire Wasp[/color] lands on your paralyzed body...

irongolem.title: irongolem
irongolem.name: Iron Giant
irongolem.description: A metallic construct given life by a ferromancer
irongolem.rumor: You hear giant footsteps and the dull ringing of metal

sebek_priest.title: sebek_priest
sebek_priest.name: Sebek Priest
sebek_priest.description: A reptilian healer from the astral swamps. Always accompanied by a devoted warrior
sebek_priest.rumor: You see a pink sigil. There is a disturbing swampy odor
sebek_priest.taunt: The [color=#a000ff]Sebek Priest[/color] recites an incantation over your tortured body...

deathknight.title: deathknight
deathknight.name: Death Knight
deathknight.description: A grim warrior-mage. Pursues the secrets of death at the end of the world
deathknight.rumor: You see a pile of slain Flesh Priests with their skin removed

moroidknight.title: moroidknight
moroidknight.name: Moroid Knight
moroidknight.description: A fanatic warrior-priest. Worships an inscrutable entity knows as the "stinging tree"
moroidknight.rumor: You see an emerald banner depicting a thorned tree
moroidknight.taunt: The [color=#509f60]Moroid Knight[/color] plants a burning seed in your flesh...

grangadancer.title: grangadancer
grangadancer.name: Granga Dancer
grangadancer.description: A strange bronze-masked warrior from the icy crevasse-lands
grangadancer.rumor: You see see strange diagrams of ice

samnite.title: samnite
samnite.name: Fallen Samnite
samnite.description: A murderous prince of the Obelisk. Seeks pilgrims as trophies
samnite.rumor: There are lustrous banners bearing a golden sigil

cinderbeast.title: cinderbeast
cinderbeast.name: Cinderbeast
cinderbeast.description: A waddling creature that draws life from flame itself
cinderbeast.rumor: You see nests of glowing red moss

filthrevenant.title: filthrevenant
filthrevenant.name: Filth Revenant
filthrevenant.description: A cursed warrior-spirit animated by putrid energies
filthrevenant.rumor: A putrid curse haunts this place
filthrevenant.taunt: The [color=#a0a000]Filth Revenant[/color] gouges you with a wretched knife...

horrorgolem.title: horrorgolem
horrorgolem.name: Horror Giant
horrorgolem.description: A towering figure of shimmering volatile substance. The god at the end of the world...unless...
horrorgolem.rumor: Here stands the god at the end of the world...
horrorgolem.intro:
The [color=#af9060]Horror Giant[/color] apprehends you!

"Little pilgrim...The end is near..."

voggite.title: voggite
voggite.name: Voggite
voggite.description: A twisting mercurial shape called down from the void to feast on all creation. The will-form of an ascended power
voggite.intro:
The [color=#af9060]Voggite[/color] emerges through a slit in the air!

The walls vibrate. Sour smell of metal...

demongreen.title: demongreen
demongreen.name: Green Demon
demongreen.description: A grotesque oozing demon. Amasses its bulk from the flux of life and death
demongreen.rumor: You dimly perceive a vast bulk moving between the stars

demonred.title: demonred
demonred.name: Red Demon
demonred.description: A fiery demon born from destructive passion. Composed of burning blood
demonred.rumor: The stars here seem produce smoke. You feel it burning your skin
demonred.taunt: The [color=#ff0050]Red Demon[/color] turns your blood into smoke...

demonwhite.title: demonwhite
demonwhite.name: White Demon
demonwhite.description: A demon composed of strange white crystals. Emits a devastating coldness
demonwhite.rumor: A terrible blankness seems to crush this space

demongold.title: demongold
demongold.name: Gold Demon
demongold.description: A demon of radiant yellow light. Said to spring from "the room at the end of the mind"
demongold.rumor: You hear voices calling. Strange thoughts...

demonviolet.title: demonviolet
demonviolet.name: Violet Demon
demonviolet.description: A sparkling demon of the chaotic star-winds
demonviolet.rumor: There are sudden flashes of blue light

arbiter.title: arbiter
arbiter.name: Arbiter
arbiter.description: A golden bodyguard of the "Divine Invader"
arbiter.rumor: A golden path seems to form between the stars
arbiter.taunt: The [color=#ffa030]Arbiter[/color] brings down its golden scythe...

devilred.title: devilred
devilred.name: Baalus
devilred.description: An imp-beckoning duke of the infernal plane. Wields a penetrating fire
devilred.rumor: You smell the reek of sulfur. There are red cracks in the dark
devilred.taunt: The [color=#ff8030]Baalus[/color] casts you into a fissure of red light...

icewasp.title: icewasp
icewasp.name: Ice Wasp
icewasp.description: An insect malformed by ice. Unleashed by an ancient cryomancer in an attempt to invade the void
icewasp.rumor: You hear a sharp insectoid buzzing. You feel a vast chill
icewasp.taunt: The [color=#5080ff]Ice Wasp[/color] descends on your frozen body...

kolec.title: kolec
kolec.name: Kolec
kolec.description: A 7-spiked crystalline shape that transmigrates the void
kolec.rumor: Sharp pale-green shards float in glittering trails
kolec.taunt: The [color=#50ff90]Kolec[/color] impales your body with crystalline thorns...

gora.title: gora
gora.name: Gora
gora.description: A void-banished hound of embodied bloodlust. Charges at incredible speed
gora.rumor: You hear a chorus of gutteral howling

Malad.title: Malad
Malad.name: Malaga
Malad.description: A star-beast of elemental blood drawn to potentialities of violence. A spiralling gore-dancer
Malad.rumor: There is a dim red glow. Something spirals through the dark

Pentot.title: Pentot
Pentot.name: Pentot
Pentot.description: An ascetic five-eyed demon-warrior of the dark between the stars. Wields a disrupting astral blade
Pentot.rumor: You see a levitating banner depicting a five-eyed mask
Pentot.taunt: The[color=#8030af]Pentot[/color] rips through your chest..."O swift mortality"

king.title: king
king.name: King of Many Colors
king.description: An invader from beyond the Astral Wall. King of demons. Master of distorted light
king.rumor: A lone figure stands atop the astrolith...
king.intro:
The [color=#9030ff]King of Many Colors[/color] appears!

"O disciples..."
king.taunt: The [color=#9030ff]King of Many Colors[/color] casts you into the abyss...

king2.intro:

king2.taunt: The [color=#ff9030]King of Many Colors[/color] casts you into the abyss...

ratman_archer.title: ratman_archer
ratman_archer.name: Rat-man Peltast
ratman_archer.description: A humanoid rodent that lives in swarming colonies

astropede.title: astropede
astropede.name: Astropede
astropede.description: A blurred creature summoned from the astral dark. Its mandibles bypass armor

dancing_flesh.title: dancing_flesh
dancing_flesh.name: Dancing Flesh
dancing_flesh.description: An cursed sheet of flesh derived by a Skin Priest from a wounded enemy

hound.title: hound
hound.name: Hound
hound.taunt: The [color=#f0a060]Hound[/color] latches onto your throat. Your knees buckle...

sebek_warrior.title: sebek_warrior
sebek_warrior.name: Sebek Warrior
sebek_warrior.description: A reptilian warrior from the astral swamps. Accompanies a priest in journeys to Achra

moroidzealot.title: moroidzealot
moroidzealot.name: Moroid Zealot
moroidzealot.description: A stooped follower of the great "stinging tree"
moroidzealot.taunt: The [color=#509f60]Moroid Zealot[/color] offers your body to its master...

impred.title: impred
impred.name: Red Imp
impred.description: A flapping pot-bellied minion summoned from the infernal plane
